title: Custom Item Sets
body:
For some reason, I can't make and item set. 
I can choose who I want the set to be for, and the map and stuff like that, but it's actually putting items in the slots that doesn't work. 
The items just go back, instead of being put into the block, so I can't create any sets for myself.
Is there any problem someone may know about?

replies.body: YO sorry i saw this yesterday but forgot to tell you, first when you click item sets, make sure you click( on the left side +) then it will make teh page appear then after you pick everything the plus, it should be as simple as that, but keep in mind this game is broken as hell, please update me as im curious! :D
